snippet.title: Ultimate Sonic Fighter : Remaster - SAGE 2024 Trailer
snippet.description:
Trailer da SAGE 2024!!!!

Eae galera blz? Hoje é dia de mostrar um dos projetos que será lançado na Sage deste ano, se trata de um "remaster" de um dos meus fangames que mais teve repercussão junto com o Unleashed que é o Ultimate Sonic Fighter! Essa nova versão contem novos modos de jogo, gameplay mais frenética, novas musicas e o bonus do sistema tag no qual vc pode jogar no modo Custon! Espero que gostem e se divirtam com ele tanto quanto se divertiram na primeira versão lá em 2017! Fiquem com Deus e Até a proxima! 

___________________________________________________________________________

Hey guys! Today is the day to show one of the projects that will be launched at this year's Sage, it is a "remaster" of one of my fangames that had the most impact along with Unleashed, which is Ultimate Sonic Fighter! This new version contains new game modes, more frantic gameplay, new music and the bonus of the tag system in which you can play in Custon mode! I hope you like it and have as much fun with it as you did with the first version back in 2017! Stay with God and see you next time! :)

Game Download: https://gamejolt.com/games/USF/723613

Channel Blog: https://corrupiaolenda.blogspot.com/p/blog-page_4.html
